PageTop: This is not an official european website.
InDev: This page is actualy on development

Text: This website copies legal information from the European Union and presents it in a simple style to facilitate a better understanding of this organisation and its activities. It is still under construction, so it does not yet show all procedures.
It does not create press articles (analysis, talks...). However, it may contain text indications (in purple) about the nature of some displayed objects (regulations, amendments...).
This website is created by a french citizen.
Host: OVH SAS; 2 rue Kellermann, 59100 Roubaix. France.
